meanings.definition: Easily forgotten or not worth remembering.
meanings.sent1: The forgettable movie had a predictable plot.
meanings.sent2: The party was forgettable because nothing exciting happened.
meanings.sent3: The forgettable joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her forgettable performance in the play left the audience unimpressed.
meanings.sent5: The forgettable song played softly in the background.

meanings.definition: Able to be forgotten or not memorable.
meanings.sent1: The forgettable meeting lasted only a few minutes.
meanings.sent2: The forgettable souvenir was left behind at the hotel.
meanings.sent3: The forgettable task was completed quickly and easily.
meanings.sent4: His forgettable excuse for being late was not convincing.
meanings.sent5: The forgettable dream faded away upon waking up.
